text:
Hello! I'm Becky Lawlor, a freelance B2B tech content marketing writer with a focus on conducting original survey-based research and writing long-form research and interview-driven content like research reports, definitive guides, white papers, ebooks, articles and case studies. Super psyched to join this group. I've been pursuing the different channels -- and seeing lots of interesting convos and great content. Looking forward to participating in the community.

If you have any questions on conducting original research for content marketing, I'd love to help answer your questions. Feel free to DM or connect with me on Linkedin: <https://www.linkedin.com/in/beckylawlor/>
